snippet: The changes institutionalize tactics adopted ad hoc in Iraq and Afghanistan, including putting some conventional units under Special Operations command.
abstract: Army is reshaping the way many soldiers are trained and deployed, with some conventional units placed under Special Operations commanders and others assigned to regions of the world viewed as emerging security risks, like Africa; changes institutionalize many tactics adopted ad hoc in Iraq and Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The changes institutionalize tactics adopted ad hoc in Iraq and Afghanistan, including putting some conventional units under Special Operations command.
